Sebagai tindakan kepedulian terhadap kasus penipuan, mohon masukkan pola penipuan baru yang Anda temukan di bawah ini!

Thank you for your participation in maintaining security together! Your report regarding the latest phishing attempt is highly valuable to us. With your contribution, we can collaborate to uphold online security and protect users from potential security risks. We appreciate your cooperation in keeping the digital environment safe and secure.
